NLPattern.name: nounphrase-skipdeterminer
NLPattern.head: nounPhrase(X, N, P, C)
NLPattern.body: nounPhraseNoDeterminer(X, N, P, C)

NLPattern.name: nounphrase-determiner
NLPattern.head: nounPhrase(X, N, P, #and(#cons(ART, X, N), C))
NLPattern.body: determiner(ART, N) nounPhraseNoDeterminerNoProperNoun(X, N, P, C)

NLPattern.name: nounphrase-determiner-preposition1
NLPattern.head: nounPhrase(X, N, P, #and(#cons(ART, X, N), #and(C,#cons(PREPOSITION, X, O2))))

NLPattern.name: nounphrase-determiner-preposition2

NLPattern.name: nounphrase-all-of

NLPattern.name: nounphrase-all-the

NLPattern.body: noun(X, N) ('that'|'who') (verb('verb.be'[symbol], N, [third-person], T)| verb('verb.seem'[symbol], N, [third-person], T)) adjective(A)

NLPattern.name: nounphrase-npn-noun
NLPattern.head: nounPhraseNoDeterminerNoProperNoun(X, N, [third-person], noun(X, N))
NLPattern.body: noun(X, N)

NLPattern.name: nounphrase-npn-adjective
NLPattern.head: nounPhraseNoDeterminerNoProperNoun(X, N, P, #and(adjective(X, A), C))
NLPattern.body: adjective(A) nounPhraseNoDeterminerNoProperNoun(X, N, P, C)

NLPattern.name: nounphrase-npn-that-verb-obj-phrase
NLPattern.head: nounPhraseNoDeterminerNoProperNoun(X, N, [third-person], #and(#cons(VERB, X, O2), noun(X, N)))
NLPattern.body: noun(X, N) ('that'|'who') verb(VERB, N, [third-person], T) #symbolToSort(VERB, VERB_SORT) #subsumes([relation-verb], VERB_SORT) nounPhrase(X2, [singular], P2, C2) #derefFromContext(C2, O2)

NLPattern.name: propernoun-compound1
NLPattern.head: properNounCompound(X3, N)
NLPattern.body: proper-noun(X, N) proper-noun(X2, N) #concatenateSymbols(X,' '[symbol],X2,X3)

NLPattern.name: propernoun-compound2
NLPattern.head: properNounCompound(X, N)
NLPattern.body: proper-noun(X, N)
